articles.description: Researchers found a mysterious arrangement of large stones resting on the lake bed. Dubbed "Michigan’s Stonehenge" by those who’ve seen it
articles.content: Beneath the tranquil surface of Grand Traverse Bay lies a secret far older than any shipwreck. Long known for calm waters and a proud seafaring past, the bay is now drawing attention for a prehistori… [+5200 chars]
